annotation.p: Sasha is a progressive Moscow blonde. She is in her thirties, there is no virus on the horizon yet, and she is going on a journey promised to her by Shiva himself on the sacred Indian mountain Arunachala.

Sasha will meet historians-necroempaths, Roman princeps, American corporate anarchists, Turkish philologists-Sufis, Cuban sex-workers, and other interesting people (and not only people). But most importantly, she will touch the Great Mystery - and see what Elon Musk calls "computer simulation", and what the Holy Church calls "the God's Creation".
You will learn what Sasha became after meeting the Mystery from the book. What the Mystery became after meeting Sasha, you are already somewhat aware of.

title-info.keywords: postmodernism, mystery, philosophical prose, spiritual quest, contemporary art
